episodes.title: The German Woman
episodes.plot: The German wife of a rich and influential aristocrat exempted from wartime internment is found decapitated in the midst of anti-German feeling.

episodes.title: The White Feather
episodes.plot: The arrest of a young girl on a sabotage charge brings Foyle into contact with a group of English Nazi sympathizers.

episodes.title: A Lesson in Murder
episodes.plot: Foyle investigates the suicide of a pacifist and death threats to the judge who ruled against his conscientious objector status.

episodes.title: Eagle Day
episodes.plot: Foyle investigates a man found with a knife in his stomach in a bombed out building while son Andrew gets involved in a top secret radar program.
